title: Bluewheel mining NFT project: Solving the transparency and auditing issue with cloud mining
desc: Bluewheel Gulf has recently partnered with DeFi nation studios, a Singapore-based Blockchain studio, for the Bitcoin Mining NFT project under Bluewheel Mining.

title: BlueWheel Gulf Secures 5 MW Bitcoin Mining Contract from Private Investors in Dubai
desc: BlueWheel Gulf â€“ Dubai Based Bitcoin Mining Company has signed an additional 5 MW Bitcoin mining contract from a  group of Private Investors in Dubai. It marks a significant milestone for the company, which has been mining Bitcoin sustainably around CIS countries.

title: Dubai-based crypto miner BlueWheel Gulf signs 5 MW Bitcoin mining contract with private investor
desc: Dubai-based bitcoin mining company BlueWheel Gulf signed a 5-megawatt bitcoin mining contract with private investors. The company's total mining operations will reach 6.5 megawatts and have 2,000 ASIC mining machines.
